body.name: GNCC Indoor Security Camera Dog Camera 1080P Motion Detection, 2-Way Audio Siren, Night Vision, Cloud & SD Card Storage, Works w/Alexa & Google Home, 2.4G WiFi, C2
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 52 mins
features: 【3M Tape - Easy to Set!】 GNCC C2 Indoor Camera - Designed for hassle-free! Provided with a 3M Tape, this compact and lightweight GNCC indoor camera can be easily mounted on any flat surface with various installation ways. No drilling, no damage, no effort, just tape it to anywhere you like and enjoy a relaxing and worry-free life! The GNCC indoor camera only works with 2.4GHz Wi-Fi (5G is not supported)

【Motion/Sound Detection & Real-Time Alerts】 Stay informed about everything happened in your room even when you're away! The built-in smart sensor and instant notifications of the GNCC indoor camera give you complete peace of mind! Whenever motion or sound is detected, the GNCC indoor camera will record a video and send a real-time alert via the Osaio APP. You can check it out right away or view the footage later to see what's happening in your room

【1080P Resolution & Infrared Night Vision】 Always stay in sight no matter day or night! With 1080P pixels, the GNCC indoor camera can capture every detail in your room. You can remotely monitor your room via the Osaio APP. With 6pcs 850nm infrared lights, the GNCC indoor camera can display crystal clear images up to 26ft even in complete darkness. GNCC C2 indoor camera, a great helper to safeguard your home security

【Two-Way Audio & APP Control】 Hear and talk to anyone from anywhere with GNCC C2 indoor camera! With the built-in microphone and speaker of the GNCC indoor camera, you can interact with your family, friends or pets at any place via the Osaio APP. The GNCC indoor camera also allows multiple devices to view. Share this GNCC indoor camera with your family or friends and enjoy the convenience GNCC indoor camera brings to you

【Optional Storage & 24/7 Recording】 Coming with double storage options, keep your precious moment either with micro SD Card or Cloud storage! After inserting a micro SD card (not included) into the GNCC indoor camera, it can record videos continuously and store them into the micro SD card. The GNCC indoor camera supports micro SD cards up to 128GB. You can also choose to subscribe to the Cloud service to avoid losing important video clips. Any worries? Find us on the product box

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.9 3.9 out of 5 stars 2,166 ratings 3.9 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Does the camera support 5G Wi-Fi? No, it can only work with 2.4GHz Wi-Fi. For a stable connection, the distance between the camera and router should better be close. Can I rotate the camera remotely with the app? No, the camera can only be set and focused on one position, it cannot pan/tilt with the app. You can adjust it to the angle you want and remotely view it via the app. Why the screen of the Security Camera is upside down? Maybe you flip the Security Camera up on the ceiling, please turn on "Rotate Image" in the ‘Audio & Video’ of the settings. Why the Indoor Camera can't record video to my SD Card? Maybe your SD Card isn't identified by the Camera, please change your SD card to 8-64GB, and format it in FAT 32. Does the camera support multiple accounts to view at the same time? Yes, you can invite your family members and friends to register an Osaio account, then enter their Osaio account’s email address to share them with the camera. (You cannot log into the same account on different devices.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All around Amazing quality!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This camera is amazing, the sound quality is awesome, the clarity, even from the room next door is so clear!! The colors are spot on, and it is very clear, not even blurring from the kitchen lights!! I definitely recommend this and would buy it again, it also takes a SD card anddddd it if it uses any of my cloud it is such a tiny bit!!!This is such a great buy and the price was very reasonable!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The price is right and well worth it.
reviews.reviewText: GNCC C2 cam arrived well packaged and able to setup with ease. Initially had trouble with cam recording motions. Reached out to GNCC and problem was rectified along with some extra free days of monitoring in the cloud for my troubles. Impressed with how fast this cam load video for playback and with its clarity while recording. Freely get my 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worked well until it didn’t
reviews.reviewText: When I first hooked up the cameras and set up detection recordings it worked. I was so happy until it just stopped working. It literally only worked for a few days. I still get notifications but when I go to review the activity it says no recording found. I’m so frustrated. Because I got rid of the boxes and can’t return it. Would not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So happy with this camera!
reviews.reviewText: I've been so impressed with this camera's resolution and quality. The app allows you to zoom, 2-way talk, and it's color/night vision. I would 100% get this camera again if needed for another area in our home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Camera quality a little grainy for being what it says it is
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to mount but a real pain to link up using QR code... you follow the instructions and try to line it up and it takes half an hour or more to line it up right

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this camera to keep an eye on my husband‘s grandfather during the day while we were at work and it works amazing good sound quality good visible quality all around great camera

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality but can't be moved
reviews.reviewText: I like the camera itself but once you put it up there is no moving it. A lot of times when I put a camera up I will move it to a different spot because I didn't like the angle. This camera comes with 1 sticky pad(which is extremely sticky) there is no holes for screws, so in order for me to be able to put it on the wall and see if it shows what I want to see I have to use the 1 and only sticky pad to hang the camera on the wall.well I do not see all that I need to and now it is stuck there. Also when we move into our next house how am I supposed to bring it with us? Also the ir option you can't see anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect crystal clear video day and night. Great Camera and definitely worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing little camera for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I've only one issue with this camera, but more on the later.I paid £15 for this and its been brilliant, it seems to be well made, set up is simple and does work extremely well with alexa.There tends to be a slight delay in getting the picture on screen, especially when compared to a ring doorbell. its not wide angled, but it doesn't claim to be.Alead is provided, (I bought a longer one) and it will record to Micro sd (not supplied)Night vision is good, motion detection and sound detections both good, there is a little delay in communication to the camera (you can hear and talk through it)The app is very good and very tweakable.My only slight issue in when viewed on a larger tv (I have a 65 Amazon Fire TV) the image isn't great. But it's good that you can actually do it I guess. On Iphone the image looks great, no problems.Great little bit of kit.

La cámara por lo que cuesta no se le puede pedir más.La función la hace correctamente.Yo la utilizo para controlar la caldera y funciona de maravilla.La instalación es súper fácil.La imagen se ve nítida y la puedes ampliar.Tiene la opción de escuchar el sonido de donde la tengas puesta y puedes activar que te avise,si detecta algún sonido más fuerte de lo anormal.Tambien puedes hablar por el móvil y se escucha a través de la cámara y tb tiene detención de movimiento y tb te avisa al móvil.Por lo que cuesta no puedes pedir más.
Die Verarbeitung ist sehr Qualitativ für denn kleinen Preis, Installation bequem sehr einfach und schnellTon und Bild Qualität sehr gut, im großen und ganzen sehr gut

Ottima videocamera di sorveglianza, permette anche l'attivazione cassa e microfono per parlare o ascoltare.Potrebbe succedere di non riuscire a collegare la videocamera una volta che si prova a scansionare il QR code del nostro Wi-Fi, per risolvere basta entrare nella pagina internet del nostro Wi-Fi e attivare anche il 2.4 G . A quel punto la videocamera si collegherà senza problema!La qualità dell'immagine è davvero impressionante.Questo prodotto mi ha dato la possibilità di tenere in sicurezza la mia casa a un prezzo molto onesto.Sono davvero soddisfatta!
Produit très correct pour le prix une belle qualité d'image le mode nuit très bien aussi le son est de bonne qualité autant que le micro facile à installer je recommande le produit
